messages.subject: More Harry Potter...
messages.msgSnippet: This will probably make the US papers too, but just in case....According to tomorrow s edition of The Times, ........ ... J.K. ROWLING is to write two short
messages.messageBody:
This will probably make the US papers too, but just in case....According to
tomorrow's edition of "The Times," ........

>>
J.K. ROWLING is to write two short spin-off books from her Harry Potter
series in aid of the charity Comic Relief. She also intends to do the
illustrations herself.
Bloomsbury will publish Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them and Quidditch
through the Ages early next year, in time for Comic Reliefâ€™s Red Nose Day on
March 16. <<

The full article is on the newspaper's web site at the moment. If you look at
it after tomorrow, you'll probably have to do the free registration thing....

http://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/0,,20181,00.html

Mattie
